name: contentful
description: Client for Contentful's Content Delivery API
author: Stephan Seidt <stephan@contentful.com>

scripts.bower-build: browserify -s contentful --debug -t [ babelify --sourceMapRelative . ] -t uglifyify index.es6.js | exorcist dist/contentful.min.js.map > dist/contentful.min.js
scripts.prepublish: babel index.es6.js -s -o index.es5.js; npm run bower-build
